org.opendaylight.controller.sal.implementation.internal

Class FlowProgrammerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.implementation.internal.FlowProgrammerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandProvider, IFlowProgrammerService, IPluginOutFlowProgrammerService

    public class FlowProgrammerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFlowProgrammerService, IPluginOutFlowProgrammerService, CommandProvider
    The SAL Flow Programmer Service. It dispatches the flow programming requests to the proper SDN protocol plugin and it notifies about asynchronous messages received from the network node related to flow programming.

      • flowRemoved

        public void flowRemoved(Node node,
               Flow flow)
        Description copied from interface: IPluginOutFlowProgrammerService
        Inform SAL that the flow on the specified node has been removed Consumer has to expect this notification only for flows which were installed with an idle or hard timeout specified.
        Specified by:
        flowRemoved in interface IPluginOutFlowProgrammerService
        Parameters:
        node - the network node on which the flow got removed
        flow - the flow that got removed. Note: It may contain only the Match and flow parameters fields. Actions may not be present.

      • flowErrorReported

        public void flowErrorReported(Node node,
                     long rid,
                     java.lang.Object err)
        Description copied from interface: IPluginOutFlowProgrammerService
        Inform SAL that an error message has been received from a switch regarding a flow message previously sent to the switch. A Request ID associated with the offending message is also returned.
        Specified by:
        flowErrorReported in interface IPluginOutFlowProgrammerService
        Parameters:
        node - the network node on which the error reported
        rid - the offending message request id
        err - the error message

      • syncSendBarrierMessage

        public Status syncSendBarrierMessage(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IFlowProgrammerService
        Send Barrier message synchronously. The caller will be blocked until the solicitation response arrives. Solicit the network node to report whether all the requests sent so far are completed. When this call is done, caller knows that all past flow operations requested to the node in asynchronous fashion were satisfied by the network node and that in case of any failure, a message was sent to the controller.
        Specified by:
        syncSendBarrierMessage in interface IFlowProgrammerService
        Parameters:
        node - The network node to solicit
        Returns:
        The status of this request containing the unique request id

      • asyncSendBarrierMessage

        public Status asyncSendBarrierMessage(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IFlowProgrammerService
        Send Barrier message asynchronously. The caller is not blocked. Solicit the network node to report whether all the requests sent so far are completed. When this call is done, caller knows that all past flow operations requested to the node in asynchronous fashion were satisfied by the network node and that in case of any failure, a message was sent to the controller.
        Specified by:
        asyncSendBarrierMessage in interface IFlowProgrammerService
        Parameters:
        node - The network node to solicit
        Returns:
        The status of this request containing the unique request id
